short_description: Private Solana wallet with stealth addresses and shielded payments
full_description: SIP Privacy is a privacy-first Solana wallet that shields your transactions using stealth addresses and Pedersen commitments. KEY FEATURES ★ Shielded Payments - Send SOL privately with hidden sender, amount, and recipient ★ Stealth Addresses - One-time addresses prevent transaction linking ★ Viewing Keys - Share read-only access for compliance without exposing spending ability ★ Jupiter DEX - Swap tokens with optional privacy protection ★ Background Scanning - Get notified when you receive payments ★ Multiple Privacy Providers - Choose SIP Native, Arcium, Privacy Cash, and more PRIVACY BY DEFAULT Unlike traditional wallets where all transactions are public, SIP Privacy uses cryptographic techniques to protect your financial privacy: • Pedersen Commitments hide transaction amounts • Stealth addresses prevent address reuse tracking • Viewing keys enable selective disclosure for audits COMPLIANCE READY SIP Privacy is designed for both individual privacy and institutional compliance: • Export viewing keys for auditors • Track disclosures with expiration dates • Generate compliance reports • Privacy score dashboard BUILT ON SOLANA • Fast transactions (400ms finality) • Low fees (< $0.001 per transaction) • Decentralized - your keys, your crypto • Open source on GitHub SECURITY • Native key management with Android Keystore • Biometric authentication (Fingerprint / Face Unlock) • Optional PIN backup • No third-party key custody • Seed Vault support for Solana Mobile devices Note: This app requires a Solana wallet. You can create a new wallet or import an existing seed phrase. Privacy Policy: https://sip-protocol.org/privacy Support: https://docs.sip-protocol.org
release_notes: Initial release with shielded payments, Jupiter DEX integration, and viewing key management.
